description: You are given a 0-indexed integer array nums. A subsequence of nums having length k and consisting of indices i0 < i1 < ... < ik-1 is balanced if the following holds: A subsequence of nums having length 1 is considered balanced. Return an integer denoting the maximum possible sum of elements in a balanced subsequence of nums. A subsequence of an array is a new non-empty array that is formed from the original array by deleting some (possibly none) of the elements without disturbing the relative positions of the remaining elements.
